name: Crypt of the Cursed
description:
Description

"Crypt of the Cursed" is roguelite action game. Use your sword to protect yourself against monsters in underground dungeon and kill the boss. Lets see how many levels you can clear...

Controls

W A S D: Move

E: Switch weapon

Q: Drop Weapon

Enter or Left mouse button click: Attack

Space: Dash

1 2 3 4: Inventory quick use

Esc: Open pause menu

Swords
Basically a spoon

Basic
RareUltra rare
Legendary Featuring

Spiker

Mr Skeleton

Shrek, but not that one

Big angry robot with a sword

Strange bottles with strange liquid inside



Lots of bugs




And you. The chosen one
